event.title: now part of the Cahokia Mounds State Historic Site, is located

data.event: Monks Mound, the largest man-made earthwork in North America, and now part of the Cahokia Mounds State Historic Site, is located here.
The Horseradish Festival is always during the first weekend in June and is held at Woodland Park located off of Route 159 in Collinsville.
